text:
@WhiteHouse Trump made #coronavirus crisis worse by refusing to take action.
called it a “hoax” — blaming others for his failures.
undermining the medical experts.
NOW, 40 million unemployed and 101,000 deaths
Vote him out.
One Flew Over the Cuckoo's
